subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Kyle Irving, Duke’s prized freshman point guard, returned after missing the last three months of the season with a toe injury. Irving helped spark the Blue Devils to a 84-57 blowout of No. 16 Hampton.
snippet: Kyle Irving, Duke’s prized freshman point guard, returned after missing the last three months of the season with a toe injury. Irving helped spark the Blue Devils to a 84-57 blowout of No. 16 Hampton.
